description: Contains information about care plan template records.

columns.name: CARE_INTG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the care plan record.

columns.name: CAREPLAN_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID of the type of the care plan record (Collaborative or Home Health).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Home Health/Hospice


Collaborative


Outpatient


Care Plan Reading

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The linked unique contact serial number for the patient. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI). This column is frequently used to link to the PAT_ENC_HSP table.

columns.name: PATIENT_ID
columns.description: Links OP care plan (patient-level and episodic) to the associated patient

columns.name: LINKED_PAT_CAREPLAN_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the outpatient care plan is linked at the patient level or the episode level. Yes means it is patient level, No means it is episode level.

columns.name: RFL_INSTR_NOTE_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID of the HNO record that contains the referral instructions

columns.name: READING_CAREPLAN_ID
columns.description: The link to the care plan reading Care Plan record.

columns.name: LAST_EDITED_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the care plan was last edited. This does not include documentation-only changes.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_2_C_NAME
columns.description:
Record status flag. Used in conjunction with record archived flag for encounter archiving.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Deleted


Hidden


Hidden and Soft Deleted
